channel.title: You need mage robes for magic
channel.description:
ok, on my server whenever you try and cast a spell it says, you need mage robes for magic, how can i remove it to were you dont need robes to cast spells?
if you can help msg me on msn stamxhara@hotmail.com
or seng me a msg

item.title: You need mage robes for magic
item.dc:creator: @moparscape4lifez moparscape4lifez
item.description:
@moparscape4lifez wrote:

the robes it says u need. The first set to figure out where the code is pretty easy…

Figure out what item ID the ::pickup id is for the robe you need to cast after you got the number you are pretty much done!.

Search for that number by using Ctrl+F load up client.java in notepad and look for that number once you find the line with it… just delete it and remove the { } for it…

it might not be in client.java (im pretty sure it is… it might be in Item.java or somewhere else… then just press Compile.bat and ur done

Read full topic
item.source: You need mage robes for magic
